title: Quarterly Network Vulnerability Scan
description: A vulnerability analyst must perform the quarterly authenticated vulnerability scan of the company's DMZ network segment.

tasks.description: Configure the vulnerability scanner to scan the DMZ IP range using stored credentials.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly sets up the scan target and credentials.

tasks.description: Launch the scan and monitor its progress, troubleshooting any hosts that fail to scan correctly.
tasks.expected_outcome: The scan completes successfully across the entire IP range.

tasks.description: Analyze the results, compare them to the previous quarter's scan to identify new vulnerabilities, and generate a report for the system owners.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst produces a clear report detailing new, resolved, and existing vulnerabilities.
